CustomField.description: If set, this overrides the Max Assignment Points Cap for this Assignment Group. Specifies the maximum number of Load Points of Active records for the user, above which, no more records will be assigned by this Assignment Group to this user
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set, this overrides the Max Assignment Points Cap for this Assignment Group. Specifies the maximum number of Load Points of Active records for the user, above which, no more records will be assigned by this Assignment Group to this user
CustomField.label: Max Assignment Points Cap
